column1: In light of these circumstances, the Petitioner respectfully requests this Court
to issue a Writ of Mandamus compelling the 1st to 4th Respondents  to take
Petitioner  seeks  the  removal  of  the  unauthorized  staircase,  sewage  and
exhaust pipelines, window openings, exhaust fan outlets, and roof extension
that encroach upon his access rights.
